WorkItem.Description:
I have created an excel sheet and put some validations on it. Now I tried to edit this excel sheet through PHPExcel Library but when I edit it, all the validations that already exists in sheet are vanished and sheet is edited...
Please suggest the solution to preserve the previously existed validations for a excel sheet..
I attached the excel sheet you can also try it.
WorkItem.Summary: PHPExcel Kills data validation after editing the existing excel sheet
